description: Good data inform and ground evidence-based policy making and research. On this page, you can find some of the datasets I have built, maintained, and/or used in my research.

data.title: Southeast Asian Climate NPOs
data.description: This data repository houses detailed information on climate action led by Non-Profit Organizations (NPOs) across Southeast Asia. It currently focuses on the 10 ASEAN countries and will endeavour to include more countries in and beyond the region in the near future. Our goal is to raise awareness and transparency of the region's NPO climate action and to empower informed policy making. The repository was built in collaboration with [Fionna Hudison](https://www.linkedin.com/in/fionnahudison/).
